test_cases.jd_text:
Senior ML Engineer

Required:
- Master's in CS/AI
- 5+ years ML experience
- Python, TensorFlow, PyTorch
- Production ML deployment
- Cloud (AWS/GCP/Azure)

Preferred:
- PhD in ML
- Publications
- Team leadership
